name: Siqura
description: Siqura's mission is to bring uncomplicated clarity to the men and women watching over our safety. They do this by helping them make error-free decisions during critical situations. They believe that uncomplicated clarity in video surveillance can truly contribute to a superior response and thus a safer society for all.
